general.description: After the success of the Empire's experimental INNS-1, the Siriusites saw potential for off-world crop growing in the Anarbalis system. Aptly named, Freshwater Station produces carefully engineered bumper crops for consumption by Sirius worlds in the immediate vicinity.
general.bar: The bar is dominated by the likeness of the Touchèd who officially blessed the station. The local Sirius workers seem to take particular pride in the visit since the Touchèd usually operate only in population centers.
